summary: The test suite validates the behavior of an AWS Polly client implementation by exercising voice description, lexicon creation, retrieval, update, listing, and speech synthesis operations within a mocked AWS environment using the Moto library. It also checks server-side response handling and error conditions for invalid inputs.
business_intent: Guarantee that applications leveraging AWS Polly for text‑to‑speech and lexicon management function correctly and robustly, enabling reliable integration of speech synthesis features into products.
